The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 19 January is 3,022,609 (5,370 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 14 January, there were 285,068 new confirmed cases (506.5 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 07 January, there were 356,377 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 20% (71,309 fewer cases).
